meanings.definition: relating to the study and treatment of the eye
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmological clinic offers advanced eye treatments.
meanings.sent2: The ophthalmological research paper discussed new findings in eye care.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmological conference had eye-opening presentations.
meanings.sent4: Her ophthalmological expertise shone brightly in the field of eye health.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmological textbook provided detailed information on eye diseases.

meanings.definition: a doctor specializing in eye care
meanings.sent1: My ophthalmological diagnosed my vision problem.
meanings.sent2: The ophthalmological performed a thorough eye examination.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmological had a clear vision for patient care.
meanings.sent4: The ophthalmological's dedication to eye health was commendable.
meanings.sent5: I trust my ophthalmological with my eye health.

meanings.sent1: The ophthalmological revealed no issues during the eye check-up.
meanings.sent2: I scheduled an ophthalmological to assess my vision.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmological appointment was quick and painless.
meanings.sent4: The ophthalmological provided a detailed report after the eye exam.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmological detected a minor issue during the eye test.
